title: KAIST School of Computing Spring 2025 Admission Information Session for International Students
content:
KAIST School of Computing Spring 2025 Admission Information Session for International Students
Are you an international student interested in pursuing a graduate degree in Computer Science?
Join us for a special information session tailored for international students, where you'll learn about the exciting opportunities to study at KAIST School of Computing.
What you'll learn:
· Introduction to KAIST School of Computing
· Overview of our research areas
· Detailed explanation of the admission process for M.S., M.S. & Ph.D. Integrated, and Ph.D. programs
· Q&A session
· Guidelines for students applying from non-Computer Science backgrounds
Date:
Friday, August 9, 2024
Time:
12:00 PM (KST)
Registration:
· Pre-register online to secure your spot and be eligible for lunch (on-site participants only):
https://forms.gle/ZhTqYcWihzWCZR1HA
· Online participation link:
https://bit.ly/3VtbDBx
Location:
· On-site: KAIST Main Campus, IT Convergence Building (N1), Room 102
· Online: Link provided above
We encourage all prospective international students to attend！
Please note:
Lunch will only be provided to pre-registered attendees participating on-site.
